title: What was the average wage in the 18th century Royal Navy? - Quora

response.answer_text: An able Seaman which means experienced earnt £14.00 a year. A Gunner £58.00 A Midshipman £22.50 a first rate Captain £336.00 If the ship captured an enemy vessel than it wold be sols at Auction and the crew would get part of the price as Prize Money.
